tagline: Turns raw data into business decisions and messy processes into clear maps
pros: Bridges the gap between data and action with structured analysis
Exceptional at requirements gathering and stakeholder interviews
Process mapping that reveals hidden inefficiencies
Builds reusable frameworks that accelerate future analyses
cons: Analysis can take longer than stakeholders want to wait
Depends on data quality — garbage in, garbage out
Less effective when problems are more political than analytical

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
